item.title: About me :3
item.description: My name is Aria, last name redacted :3. I am a pansexual and polyamorous non binary trans catgirl who loves video games, tech, cooking and women. And I am very cringe. Also aspiring to do gamedev someday. I am terminally obsessed with Final Fantasy XIV, but here are some of my favorite games/series: * Dark Souls * Umineko * Xenoblade * Mega Man X * Final Fantasy XIV * Ace Attorney * Trails * Fire Emblem * Any kind of 3d platformers like Donkey Kong 64!
